src.sql:
select  --U.DisplayName as Name,  
   --A.Body as Answer,
   --A.CreatedDate as Date,
  -- A.IsCorrect as Correct,
   string_agg(UU.DisplayName, '</br>') as Voters
   --count(DISTINCT AUV.UserId) as 'Votes'
   FROM app.QuestionAnswerAnswer QAA
inner join app.Answer A on A.Id = QAA.AnswerId
inner join dbo.Users U on U.UserId = A.CreatedBy
left join app.AnswerUserVotes AUV on AUV.AnswerId = QAA.AnswerId 
left join dbo.Users UU on UU.UserId = AUV.UserId

WHERE QAA.QuestionId = '[QueryString:QuestionId]' AND A.Id = '[Id]'
GROUP BY UU.DisplayName, Id
